headline: Assessing PTC (PTC) Valuation After Launch Of Windchill AI Parts Rationalization
summary: PTC (PTC) has introduced Windchill AI Parts Rationalization, a new capability within its product lifecycle management platform that uses artificial intelligence to tackle duplicate parts, inconsistent data, and slow searches across manufacturing workflows. See our latest analysis for PTC. Despite product launches like Windchill AI Parts Rationalization and new client wins such as Reditus Space, PTC’s 30 day share price return of a 10.38% decline and 90 day share price return of a 21.36%...
